content.description: Number of Olympic Athletes by Gender, 1896 to 2016
content.question: Which of the following best explains the change in female athletesâ€™ participation in Olympic Games, as indicated in the graph?

choices.label: Advances in medical technology, such as the increased use of vaccines
Expansion of economic liberalization and the signing of free-trade agreements
Growing influence of international organizations for peace and security, such as the United Nations
Increased equality and access to higher education and employment

content.answer: Increased equality and access to higher education and employment
